    • Method Detail

      • streamMessages

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<java.lang.String> streamMessages(java.lang.String email,
                                                                    java.lang.String pass)
        Method connects to Tiny Mesh cloud using parameters and streams device data from API. Streaming data from Tiny Mesh Cloud is done over HTTP using GET /v2/messages/T.
        Parameters:
        email - is a email address value that is used to connect TinyMesh cloud
        pass - is a password value that is used to connect TinyMesh cloud
        Returns:
        result
        See Also:
        Flux

      • streamDeviceUpdates

        It fetches Device updates.

      • updateDeviceState

        public void updateDeviceState(java.lang.String deviceProps)
        Method updates data in DeviceRepository (DB). DoorSensor data is saved in repository!
        Parameters:
        deviceProps - is deviceProperties
